tasks.label: Test journal APIs (build + run script)
tasks.command: node -v; if (Test-Path .next) { 'Skipping build (existing .next found)' } else { npx --yes next@15.5.3 build }; node scripts/test-journal.mjs

tasks.label: Build Next app to validate changes
Build and run journal tests
tasks.command: $env:DEV_BYPASS_AUTH='1'; if (Test-Path .next) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next }; npx --yes next@15.5.3 build; node scripts/test-journal.mjs
